name: Servers Pro For Minecraft
description:
★ $0.99, LIMITED TIME ONLY ★

Find the absolute best Minecraft PC servers with this great app providing you with lots of PC servers uploaded by other Minecraft players. Browse detailed information on each server, rate & favorite servers, comment & discuss and even sort by most liked by other users. No need to search for a good servers any more!!

This is the one and only ultimate app for you to get the servers you have always been looking for! This app will constantly provide you with the newest and very best servers worth exploring!

Are you bored of the Minecraft server you play on right now? Ever wanted to explore something new, beautiful and epic? This app won't let you down, it will constantly provide you with awesome Minecraft servers worth checking out.

Check them out now!!



★★ FEATURES
☆ Lots of Minecraft PC servers to explore!!
☆ High quality on all Minecraft servers
☆ Upload your own Minecraft server right from the app!!
☆ Descriptive information about each Minecraft server
☆ Universal app, buy once, install on all your iOS devices for free
☆ NEW servers and updates FREE of charge!
☆ AND MUCH MUCH MORE!!


★★★
If you know of any servers you want to tip us about, or feel would fit in our lists, don't hesitate to upload it to the app or drop us a message at minecraftserversapp@live.com.

Also if you have any questions, comments, information or improvements, email us at support@jninteractive.com
★★★
